item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数上升 劳动力市场放缓
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数有所增加，表明劳动力市场状况有所缓解。【原文：The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits increased last week, pointing to easing labor market conditions.】

item.title: 巴西 5 月工业产值降幅低于预期
item.description: 政府统计机构巴西地理统计局（IBGE）周三称，巴西 5 月份的工业生产比 4 月份下降了 0.9%，低于路透社调查的分析师估计的 1.7% 的降幅。【原文：Industrial production in Brazil fell 0.9% in May from April , government statistics agency IBGE said on Wednesday, below the 1.7% decline estimated by analysts polled by Reuters.】

item.title: 欧盟报告详述中国对经济的广泛干预
item.description: 在宣布对中国制造的电动汽车征收临时关税之前，欧盟委员会于 4 月发布了一份长达 712 页的报告，报告称中国政府向国内企业提供了多层补贴。【原文：In the run up to announcing provisional tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles, the European Commission in April released a 712-page report on the many layers of subsidies it argues the Chinese government provides to domestic firms.】

item.title: 美国 6 月私营部门就业人数增长放缓
item.description: 美国 6 月份私营企业薪资增幅略低于预期，与劳动力市场放缓的势头一致。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased a bit less than expected in June, consistent with slowing labor market momentum.】

item.title: 星座品牌啤酒业务强劲，季度利润超预期
item.description: 科罗娜啤酒制造商星座品牌公司（Constellation Brands）周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其核心啤酒品牌的强劲需求抵消了葡萄酒和烈酒业务的低迷。【原文：Corona beer maker Constellation Brands on Wednesday beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit, helped by strong demand for its core beer brands, which offset the sluggish wines and spirits business.】

item.title: 2001 年以来航空公司并购的发展轨迹
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三批准了一项期待已久的交易，汉莎航空将获得意大利 ITA 航空公司 41% 的股份，这是欧洲最新的一次重大合并。【原文：The European Commission approved a long-awaited deal for Lufthansa to take a 41% stake in Italy's ITA Airways on Wednesday, in Europe's latest major consolidation.】

item.title: 拜登和特朗普争夺总统宝座之际值得关注的股票
item.description: 在第一场美国总统辩论中，乔-拜登总统的表现不尽如人意，尤其是在辩论开始时，他与前总统特朗普就堕胎、移民、乌克兰和加沙战争，甚至两人的高尔夫球比赛等问题进行了激烈交锋。【原文：The first U.S. presidential debate saw President Joe Biden turning in a fitful performance, especially at the beginning, as he exchanged barbs with former President Trump on abortion, immigration, the wars in Ukraine and Gaza and even their golf games.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯怀疑中性利率已经上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周三表示，对经济影响中性的利率水平可能还没有上升太多。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said on Wednesday that the level of interest rates that’s neutral in its impact on the economy likely hasn’t risen much.】

item.title: 监管文件显示，Artisan Investments 将所持飞利浦股份增至 10
item.description: 美国资产管理公司 Artisan Investments 已将其在飞利浦公司的持股比例提高到 10%，这使得这家医疗保健技术集团的股价在周三上涨，一周前这家荷兰公司的最大股东也增持了飞利浦公司的股份。【原文：U.S. asset management firm Artisan Investments has raised its stake in Philips to 10%, sending the healthcare technology group's shares rising on Wednesday, a week after the Dutch company's biggest shareholder also increased its holding.】

item.title: 埃利奥特推动改革后，西南航空采用毒丸计划
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周三表示，在激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）推动该公司进行改革后，该公司已采取了毒丸措施。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Wednesday it had adopted a poison pill after activist investor Elliott Investment Management pushed for changes at the carrier.】

item.title: 普华永道在监管审查中任命新中国区主管
item.description: 普华永道（PwC）已任命内部高管丹尼尔-李（Daniel Li）为其新任中国区主管，此举正值该公司面临中国大陆和香港金融监管机构的调查之际。【原文：PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) has named in-house executive Daniel Li as its new China head, a move that comes as it faces investigations by financial regulators in mainland China and Hong Kong.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）结束对大众约42万辆汽车的召回查询
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周三结束了对大众汽车公司的召回查询，在此之前，该公司已对 420,072 辆汽车进行了修复，以补救潜在的燃油泄漏问题。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) on Wednesday closed a recall query on Volkswagen for 420,072 vehicles after they were fixed to remedy a potential fuel leak.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空空乘人员在新的临时合同中平均加薪 32
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）的空乘人员代表工会表示，作为与该航空公司达成的为期三年的新临时劳资协议的一部分，空乘人员的平均工资将增加 32%。【原文：Alaska Airlines' flight attendants are set for an average pay increase of 32% as part of a new three-year tentative labor agreement with the airline, a union representing the employees said.】

item.title: 最高法院削弱机构权力，美国律师事务所嗅到商机
item.description: 美国最高法院做出了一系列有利于联邦机构权力反对者的新裁决，律师事务所正在利用这些裁决引发的客户不确定性，即使律师本身也对裁决的近期和长期影响存在分歧。【原文：Law firms are capitalizing on client uncertainty sparked by a flurry of new U.S. Supreme Court rulings that favored opponents of federal agency powers, even as lawyers themselves differ on the decisions' immediate and long-term effects.】

item.title: 早间竞标：就业岗位扫描创下新纪录，特斯拉跳涨
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国人看淡燃油成本和恶劣天气，创下国庆旅游纪录
item.description: 高昂的燃料成本和飓风的威胁预计不会影响美国人今年夏天上路的愿望，度假者们正为创纪录的旅行做准备，以拉开国庆假期庆祝活动的序幕。【原文：High fuel costs and the threat of a hurricane are not expected to dampen Americans' desire to hit the road this summer, with vacationers preparing for record travel to kick off Fourth of July holiday festivities.】

item.title: 参议院调查发现，"失败的 "澳大利亚企业监督机构应一分为二
item.description: 参议院委员会周三的一份报告显示，澳大利亚的企业监督机构在 "全面 "失职后应一分为二，包括不对违法者采取行动，而更多地关注声誉管理。【原文：Australia's corporate watchdog should be split into two after "comprehensively" failing in its role, including by not taking action against offenders and focusing more on managing its reputation, a senate committee report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 预期经济数据和美联储会议纪要将使期货价格上扬
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货在节前交易中走高，因为投资者准备迎接一系列经济数据中的就业报告以及美联储 6 月份政策会议的纪要。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher in pre-holiday trading on Wednesday, as investors geared up for an employment report among a slew of economic data, along with minutes from the Federal Reserve's June policy meeting.】

item.title: 独家：印度官员参观富士康 iPhone 工厂，就招聘问题质询高管
item.description: 据路透社报道，苹果公司的主要供应商富士康一直拒绝已婚妇女从事 iPhone 组装工作，一名官员表示，印度劳工官员本周访问了富士康位于该国南部的一家工厂，并就该公司的招聘行为向高管进行了质询。【原文：Indian labour officials visited a Foxconn factory in the country's south this week and questioned executives about the company's hiring practices, an official said, after Reuters reported that the major Apple supplier has been rejecting married women from iPhone assembly jobs.】

item.title: 汉莎航空获得欧盟有条件批准 3.5 亿美元的 ITA 交易
item.description: 汉莎航空周三获得欧盟反垄断批准，以 3.25 亿欧元（3.5 亿美元）的价格收购意大利 ITA 航空公司 41% 的股份，在这笔交易中，汉莎航空出让了航线和航班时刻，这将提升其在利润丰厚的南欧市场的地位。【原文：Lufthansa on Wednesday won EU antitrust approval to buy 41% of Italy's ITA Airways for 325 million euros ($350 million) after ceding routes and slots in a deal that will boost its presence in the lucrative southern European market.】

item.title: 独家：印度要求公用事业公司今年订购 330 亿美元设备以提高煤电产量
item.description: 两位政府官员说，印度已要求电力公司今年订购价值 330 亿美元的设备，以便在未来几年快速提高燃煤发电的产能，因为这个南亚国家正在努力满足蓬勃发展的电力需求。【原文：India has asked power companies to order equipment worth $33 billion this year to fast track capacity additions of coal-fired power in the years ahead, as the South Asian nation struggles to meet booming electricity demand, two government officials said.】

item.title: 联合国报告称，中国在生成式人工智能专利竞赛中处于领先地位
item.description: 联合国周三的数据显示，中国在聊天机器人等人工智能发明方面遥遥领先于其他国家，申请的专利数量是其最接近的竞争对手美国的六倍。【原文：China is far ahead of other countries in generative AI inventions like chatbots, filing six times more patents than its closest rival the United States, U.N. data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 韩国对瑞士信贷非法卖空股票行为处以罚款
item.description: 韩国金融监管机构周三表示，对前瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse）旗下两家违规卖空股票的子公司处以创纪录的高额罚款。【原文：South Korea's financial regulator imposed record high fines on two subsidiaries of the former Credit Suisse group for stock short-selling violations, the regulator said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，意大利计划向德国莱茵金属公司订购价值 200 亿欧元的坦克
item.description: 据《Handelsblatt》商业日报周三援引行业消息人士的话报道，意大利正计划向德国莱茵金属公司购买数百辆坦克，这将是该德国防务集团有史以来最大的一笔订单，价值约 200 亿欧元（约合 215.0 亿美元）。【原文：Italy is planning to buy hundreds of tanks from Rheinmetall in what would be the German defence group's biggest ever order, valued at around 20 billion euros ($21.50 billion), the Handelsblatt business daily reported on Wednesday, citing industry sources.】

item.title: Calastone 称，英国投资者今年购买了创纪录的 145 亿美元股票
item.description: 基金网络 Calastone 的数据显示，由于央行进一步降息的前景刺激了对高风险资产的需求，英国投资者在 2024 年前六个月向股票基金追加了创纪录的 114 亿英镑（145 亿美元）资金。【原文：British investors added a record 11.4 billion pounds ($14.5 billion) into equity funds over the first six months of 2024, as the prospect of further central bank interest rate cuts fuelled demand for riskier assets, according to fund network Calastone.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克从 CureVac 收购 COVID 和流感疫苗的全部生产权
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK）周三表示，该公司已从CureVac 5CV.DE、CVAC.O公司购买了开发和生产使用信使核糖核酸（mRNA）技术的流感候选疫苗和COVID-19的全部权利，总价高达10.5亿欧元（11.3亿美元）。【原文：GSK has bought from CureVac 5CV.DE, CVAC.O the full rights to develop and manufacture vaccine candidates for influenza and COVID-19 that use messenger RNA (mRNA) technology for up to 1.05 billion euros ($1.13 billion), it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国沃达丰和维珍传媒达成新的网络共享协议
item.description: 英国沃达丰（Vodafone）和维珍媒体 O2 达成了一项新的网络共享协议，将双方现有的合作关系延长十多年。【原文：Britain's Vodafone and Virgin Media O2 agreed a new network sharing agreement to extend their existing tie-up for more than a decade, in a deal they said on Wednesday was subject to approval of the merger between Vodafone and Three UK.】

item.title: 新日铁的森喜朗将于下周再次访美，就收购美国钢铁公司进行谈判
item.description: 新日铁公司发言人周三表示，该公司副董事长计划下周再次访问美国，讨论收购美国钢铁公司的提议。【原文：Nippon Steel's vice chairman plans to return to the United States next week again to discuss its proposed acquisition of U.S. Steel , a company spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易争端升级，欧盟政府对中国电动汽车关税举棋不定
item.description: 欧盟国家在是否支持对中国制造的电动汽车征收额外关税的问题上举棋不定，这凸显了布鲁塞尔在中国政府威胁进行广泛报复的情况下，为其迄今为止最大的贸易案件争取支持所面临的挑战。【原文：EU countries are wavering over whether to back additional tariffs on Chinese-built electric vehicles, highlighting Brussels' challenge in building support for its largest trade case yet as Beijing threatens wide-ranging retaliation.】

item.title: 早间新闻鲍威尔引发降息乐观情绪
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】
